artist: Artist: Seth Tobocman , et al.; Publisher: SHADOW Press, New York

description: Saddle stitched binding, color image of speakers on a balcony decorated with the squatter insignia, an image of a hand curshing a swastika, and more, on coated paper covers; 48 pp.
title: Squatter Comics #2
